name: C. Slay the Dragon
statement:
Recently, Petya learned about a new game "Slay the Dragon". As the name
suggests, the player will have to fight with dragons. To defeat a
dragon, you have to kill it and defend your castle. To do this, the
player has a squad of n heroes, the strength of the i-th hero is equal
to a_i.According to the rules of the game, exactly one hero should go
kill the dragon, all the others will defend the castle. If the dragon’s
defense is equal to x, then you have to send a hero with a strength of
at least x to kill it. If the dragon’s attack power is y, then the total
strength of the heroes defending the castle should be at least y.The
player can increase the strength of any hero by 1 for one gold coin.
This operation can be done any number of times.There are m dragons in
the game, the i-th of them has defense equal to x_i and attack power
equal to y_i. Petya was wondering what is the minimum number of coins he
needs to spend to defeat the i-th dragon.Note that the task is solved
(improvements are not saved).
